channel.description: Recent content in Social-networks-analysis on Academic Page

item.title: Information Dissemination
item.description: This project aims to analyze the mechanisms of information propagation within social networks. What is the influence of the network topology? What is the influence of the nature of the message conveyed or its mode of transmission?

item.title: Pluralisme de l'information en ligne (ANR PIL)
